channel.title: Test on Wobbly Earth
channel.description: Recent content in Test on Wobbly Earth

item.title: Wobbly Earth
item.description:
A Jellypudding orbiting the Sun

Most people think the Earth is a sphere, while geodesists joke that the Earth’s is a potato. In fact, you can even find people who believe the Earth is flat and only 6000 years old. Asking me, I would happily claim that the Earth is a giant jellypudding.

I kind of like that concept, because it helps me to explain my research.
